name: Crown M.
locationPreference: Calgary or Hybrid Roles across Alberta
careerHighlights: Supported over 100 newcomer youth through case management, employment assistance, and integration programs.
Developed and facilitated workshops on cultural adaptation, job search strategies, and skill development.
Collaborated with community partners to create pathways for youth employment and education opportunities.

experience.description: Provided comprehensive support to newcomer youth, including career counseling and community integration.
